title: Always Energetic
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>R-, Rin-chan~! Can we take a break, please~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin can still run nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>S-, sorry, I’m at my limit…. Haah, haah….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Alright, bre~ak time! Hey, Riko-san, do you know that rolling around in grass feels good? Come on, ro~ll!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Haah, haah…. I’m so pathetic…. I guess when I come back to Uchiura, I’ll go consult Kanan about my training plan. Hey, Rin-chan, what kind of training did you do to have that kind of enduran…. Huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>*zzz*, *zzz*....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>S-, she fell asleep….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Munya….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>(...Fufu, even though she was just raring to go a second ago. Nocturne is also like this…. Just when he started frolicking around he clung to me and fell asleep….)<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Wait, no, I can’t. I’m in the middle of training. Rin-chan, break is over! Let’s continue running!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Nya….? Nya-! I’m running nya-!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
